name: Labyrinthion
overview: Labyrinthion is a flick screen action maze game in the vein of UPG's Atic Atac, in which an adventurer is trapped in a labyrinth; in order to escape he must collect the missing pieces of a magic scroll. To achieve this the player has to navigate the 256 rooms of the labyrinth, fending of the various creatures that lurk within it. To aid the adventurer in this task, a variety of weapons and tools are scattered around the labyrinth, such as oversized fly swatters and buckets of water.
